entries.title: Analytik Jena AG
entries.description: Analytical Instruments development. Elemental Analyzers - C/N/S/Cl. TOC - Total Organic Carbon analyzers. TOX - Total Organic Halides. User guiadance and software translation library with common standard methods for routine analysis with user-oriented functions, calibration, correction, recalculation, statistical functions.
